name: Car City Adventure
description:
Hey Guys!! Are you ready to take the car to reach its destination? The puzzle game involves 3 different modes in which you will be given different benefits and 

difficulties to take the car to the finish line. You need to exchange, rotate or delete the blocks of road to complete the path to finish line.
There will be various power ups to crack the game if you're stuck. Game is simple yet challenging. Wide range of levels and integration will angage you for hours. 
So get the game now and start playing this addictive game.

Key Features:
Crack The Puzzle & Take The Car To Finish Line
Use Intresting Boosters When You're Stuck
Different Modes With Difficulties & Benefits
Puzzles Upto 7 X 7 Boxes
Collect Diamonds To Unloock Other Modes
Claim Daily Rewards & Achievements
